body: Spending a day of downtime allows you to treat up to 50 patients of this type. You may combine this option with the treat disease option, caring for up to 50 total patients per day.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Activities/Heal Others/Treat Wounds from Caltrops/Spike Growth/or Spike Stones
name: Treat Wounds from Caltrops, Spike Growth, or Spike Stones
